H3.text: what countries have spanish as the national language. Spain

A4.text: Spanish is the official language—either de facto or de jure—of Mexico (co-official with 63 indigenous languages).

A5.text: Spanish is the official language—either de facto or de jure—of Argentina.

A7.text: Spanish is the official language (either by law or de facto) in 20 sovereign states.
